title: Ori vs Azir
body:
I understand that both of these champs are very difficult midlaners to play. But if one was to dedicate their life to that champ, which one would be more useful to the team.
I also understand they also may be strong a different points. So if you could elaborate why one is better then the other at certain points in the game it would be appreciated 
Early game?
Mid game? 
Late game?
Overall?
